00030 import os, time, base64, datetime
00031 import copy
00032 
00033 from Koo import Rpc
00034 
00035 import Wizard
00036 from Koo.Printer import *

00044 class ExecuteReportThread(QThread):
00045         def __init__(self, name, data, context={}, parent=None):
00046                 QThread.__init__(self, parent)
00047                 self.name = name
00048                 self.datas = data.copy()
00049                 self.status = ''
00050                 self.session = Rpc.session.copy()
00051 
00052         def run(self):
00053                 ids = self.datas['ids']
00054                 del self.datas['ids']
00055                 if not ids:
00056                         try:
00057                                 ids = self.session.call('/object', 'execute', self.datas['model'], 'search', [])
00058                         except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00059                                 self.emit( SIGNAL('error'), ( _('Error: %s') % unicode(e.type), e.message, e.data ) )
00060                                 return
00061                                 
00062                         if ids == []:
00063                                 self.emit( SIGNAL('warning'), _('Nothing to print.') )
00064                                 return 
00065                         self.datas['id'] = ids[0]
00066                 try:
00067                         ctx = self.session.context.copy()
00068                         ctx.update(context)
00069                         report_id = self.session.call('/report', 'report', self.name, ids, self.datas, ctx)
00070                         state = False
00071                         attempt = 0
00072                         while not state:
00073                                 val = self.session.call('/report', 'report_get', report_id)
00074                                 state = val['state']
00075                                 if not state:
00076                                         time.sleep(1)
00077                                         attempt += 1
00078                                 if attempt>200:
00079                                         self.emit( SIGNAL('warning'), _('Printing aborted. Delay too long.') )
00080                                         return False
00081                         Printer.printData(val)
00082                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00083                         self.emit( SIGNAL('error'), ( _('Error: %s') % unicode(e.type), e.message, e.data ) )
00084                 
00085 ## @brief Executes the given report.
00086 def executeReport(name, data, context={}):
00087         QApplication.setOverrideCursor( Qt.WaitCursor )
00088         datas = data.copy()
00089         ids = datas['ids']
00090         del datas['ids']
00091         if not ids:
00092                 ids =  Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', datas['model'], 'search', [])
00093                 if ids == []:
00094                         QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00095                         QMessageBox.information( None, '', _('Nothing to print!'))
00096                         return False
00097                 datas['id'] = ids[0]
00098         try:
00099                 ctx = Rpc.session.context.copy()
00100                 ctx.update(context)
00101                 report_id = Rpc.session.execute('/report', 'report', name, ids, datas, ctx)
00102                 state = False
00103                 attempt = 0
00104                 while not state:
00105                         val = Rpc.session.execute('/report', 'report_get', report_id)
00106                         state = val['state']
00107                         if not state:
00108                                 time.sleep(1)
00109                                 attempt += 1
00110                         if attempt>200:
00111                                 QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00112                                 QMessageBox.information( None, '', _('Printing aborted, too long delay !'))
00113                                 return False
00114                 Printer.printData(val, datas['model'], ids)
00115         except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00116                 Common.error( _('Error: %s') % str(e.type), e.message, e.data )
00117         QApplication.restoreOverrideCursor()
00118         return True
00119 
00120 ## @brief Executes the given action id (it could be a report, wizard, etc).
00121 def execute(act_id, datas, type=None, context={}):
00122         ctx = Rpc.session.context.copy()
00123         ctx.update(context)
00124         if type==None:
00125                 res = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.actions.actions', 'read', [act_id], ['type'], ctx)
00126                 if not len(res):
00127                         raise Exception, 'ActionNotFound'
00128                 type=res[0]['type']
00129         res = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', type, 'read', [act_id], False, ctx)[0]
00130         Api.instance.executeAction(res,datas)
00131 
00132 ## @brief Executes the given action (it could be a report, wizard, etc).
00133 def executeAction(action, datas, context={}):
00134         if 'type' not in action:
00135                 return
00136         if action['type']=='ir.actions.act_window':
00137                 for key in ('res_id', 'res_model', 'view_type', 'view_mode',
00138                                 'limit', 'auto_refresh'):
00139                         datas[key] = action.get(key, datas.get(key, None))
00140 
00141                 if datas['limit'] is None or datas['limit'] == 0:
00142                         datas['limit'] = 80
00143 
00144                 view_ids=False
00145                 if action.get('views', []):
00146                         view_ids=[x[0] for x in action['views']]
00147                         datas['view_mode']=",".join([x[1] for x in action['views']])
00148                 elif action.get('view_id', False):
00149                         view_ids=[action['view_id'][0]]
00150 
00151 
00152                 if not action.get('domain', False):
00153                         action['domain']='[]'
00154                 ctx = {'active_id': datas.get('id',False), 'active_ids': datas.get('ids',[])}
00155                 ctx.update(Rpc.session.evaluateExpression(action.get('context','{}'), ctx.copy()) )
00156                 ctx.update(context)
00157 
00158                 a = ctx.copy()
00159                 a['time'] = time
00160                 a['datetime'] = datetime
00161                 domain = Rpc.session.evaluateExpression(action['domain'], a)
00162 
00163                 if datas.get('domain', False):
00164                         domain.append(datas['domain'])
00165 
00166                 target = action.get('target','current')
00167                 if not target:
00168                         target = 'current'
00169                 Api.instance.createWindow( view_ids, datas['res_model'], datas['res_id'], domain,
00170                         action['view_type'], datas.get('window',None), ctx,
00171                         datas['view_mode'], name=action.get('name', False), autoReload=datas['auto_refresh'], 
00172                         target=target )
00173 
00174                 #for key in tools.expr_eval(action.get('context', '{}')).keys():
00175                 #       del Rpc.session.context[key]
00176 
00177         elif action['type']=='ir.actions.wizard':
00178                 win=None
00179                 if 'window' in datas:
00180                         win=datas['window']
00181                         del datas['window']
00182                 Wizard.execute(action['wiz_name'], datas, parent=win, context=context)
00183 
00184         elif action['type']=='ir.actions.report.custom':
00185                 if 'window' in datas:
00186                         win=datas['window']
00187                         del datas['window']
00188                 datas['report_id'] = action['report_id']
00189                 Api.instance.executeReport('custom', datas)
00190 
00191         elif action['type']=='ir.actions.report.xml':
00192                 if 'window' in datas:
00193                         win=datas['window']
00194                         del datas['window']
00195                 Api.instance.executeReport(action['report_name'], datas)
00196 
00197 ## @brief Executes the given keyword action (it could be a report, wizard, etc).
00198 def executeKeyword(keyword, data={}, context={}):
00199         actions = None
00200         if 'id' in data:
00201                 try:
00202                         id = data.get('id', False) 
00203                         actions = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute',
00204                                         'ir.values', 'get', 'action', keyword,
00205                                         [(data['model'], id)], False, Rpc.session.context)
00206                         actions = map(lambda x: x[2], actions)
00207                 except Rpc.RpcException, e:
00208                         return None
00209 
00210         if not actions:
00211                 Notifier.notifyWarning( _('No actions defined'), _('There are no actions defined for this item.') )
00212                 return None
00213 
00214         keyact = {}
00215         for action in actions:
00216                 keyact[action['name']] = action
00217 
00218         res = Common.selection(_('Select your action'), keyact)
00219         if not res:
00220                 return None
00221         (name,action) = res
00222         Api.instance.executeAction(action, data, context=context)
00223         return (name, action)
